entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
